text: El Disco (stylized as #ELDISCO) is the twelfth studio album recorded by Spanish singer-songwriter Alejandro Sanz. It was released on 5 April 2019. ==Singles== "No Tengo Nada" was released on 30 November 2018 as the album's lead single. On 8 February 2019, "Back in the City" was released as the album's second single. "Mi Persona Favorita" was released on 28 March 2019 as the album's third single. == Track listing == ==Accolades== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Year ! scope="col"| Award ceremony ! scope="col"| Category ! scope="col"| Result |- ! scope="row"; rowspan=2| 2019 | rowspan=2| Latin Grammy Award | Album of the Year | |- | Best Contemporary Pop Vocal Album | |- ! scope="row"|2020 | Grammy Award | Best Latin Pop Album | |- |} ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Mexican Albums (AMPROFON) | 2 |- ! scope="row"| Spanish Albums (PROMUSICAE) | 1 |- |} == Certifications == ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Alejandro Sanz albums Category:Spanish-language albums Category:Universal Music Spain albums
title: El Disco
